description.@en: The horrid stench of the last meal you ate is emitted from your smallclothes. It turns instantly into a green, noxious gas which surrounds all around in a cloud of stomach-churning nastiness.

criticalFailure.@en: Your body is torturously wracked with convulsions from incessant dry heaving. You begin to Suffocate, immediately suffering from [[/roll 2D10+2]] physical Peril. Refer to the Suffocation section of Hazards & Healing from ZWEIHÄNDER.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but foes who successfully Resist drop two steps down the Peril Condition Track negatively.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the rotten stench of yesterday’s meal wafts around you. All those who are Engaged with you must Resist with a successful Toughness Test or else be left Helpless for a minute. Those who successfully Resist drop one step down the Peril Condition Track negatively.

reagents.@en: A meal of rotten eggs and curdled milk, eaten in the last 24 hours (expended)
